questionText: Which of the following statements provides the BEST example of the ‘AI Effect’?

answerOptions.answerText: People lose their jobs as AI-based systems perform their roles cheaper and better
Competitive computer games lose popularity as AI-based systems always win
Rule-based expert systems for medical diagnosis are no longer considered to be AI
People believe AI will take over the world, as shown in films

questionText: Which of the following options is NOT a technology used to implement AI?
